targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*)
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  action_name,
  count(*)
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by time, action_name
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  author_username,
  count(*)
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(author_username, ' {', action_name, '}') as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by 1, author_username, action_name
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace, ' {', e.action_name, '}') as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace, action_name
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace, ' {', e.author_username, '}') as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and action_name in ($action)
  and target_type in ($target)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and action_name in ('pushed new','pushed to')
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(e.author_username) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and action_name in ('pushed new','pushed to')
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and target_type='MergeRequest'
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(e.author_username) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and target_type='MergeRequest'
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(e.author_username) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and action_name='opened'
  and target_type='MergeRequest'
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(e.author_username) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and action_name='accepted'
  and target_type='MergeRequest'
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and action_name='commented on'
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(e.author_username) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and action_name='commented on'
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(e.author_username) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and is_review_comment=true
group by 1, author_username
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Comments by users in foreign merge requests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(e.created_at, $resolution),
  count(*),
  CONCAT(p.name_with_namespace) as tags
FROM events as e
JOIN projects as p on e.project_id=p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and author_username in ($username)
  and p.name_with_namespace in ($project)
  and is_review_comment=true
group by 1, p.name_with_namespace
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Review comments by project
